title: shurima art short list
body:
have the prices been rewarded to the short list ?
because the voting date is passed and yet the winners havent been announced and my art too was in the shortlist and 
short list arts too get gifts nah i didnt get any yet 
all i wanted is to get information about that event 
have u all announced the winner ?

replies.body:
Hey Ironhunt, 

We've announced the shortlist and will announce the winners on Monday. 

We have reached out to all the shortlisted participants by email. Have you received an email from me?
Yeah i have got sorry i didnt check my email
